products.title: Snow White Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Snow White Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: The gorgeous pleated Snow White Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit blind is simple, stylish and versatile. Its elegant white can be paired in an endless amount of ways, to add a modern, classy feel to its paired window. You simply can’t go wrong with a clean, crisp white blind Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The blackout pleated fabric will gently filter the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more.

products.title: Honey White PerfectFIT Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Bright white with a hint of rose, this Honey White venetian has a sweet and soft finish. It will keep your conservatory looking ever so light while adding a delicate, homely touch to your decor.
products.productdescription: Bright white with a hint of rose, this Honey White venetian has a sweet and soft finish. It will keep your conservatory looking ever so light while adding a delicate, homely touch to your decor.

products.title: Infusion asc White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4101. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion asc White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Galaxy asc Blackout White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Galaxy asc Blackout White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX6010. A stylish, blackout pleated blind produced with an asc, solar reflective, backing.
products.productdescription: Part of our Galaxy Blackout range, where Advanced Solar Control (ASC) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.

products.title: Vassal Frost Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Vassal Frost Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Vassal Frost is a crisp white with a delicate tint, for a clean and bright blind that has a calmness and purity about it. Matching beautifully with its white UPVC frame, the innovative Perfect Fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free, fuss-free fit. The dimout style allows a gentle scatter of light to filter through even when the blind is closed, to enable both light and privacy together, making this an ideal choice for 'daytime' rooms such sunrooms and living rooms. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required
